AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically(type yes to active or no to deactive  ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_LIKE_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically(type yes to active or no to deactive  ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Turn this 'on' if you want the bot to automatically block ANYONE WHO SENDS YOU A MESSAGE. Use 'off' to disable it.

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be downloaded automatically and sent to you(type yes to activate or no to deactivate ; don't write in capital letter)

PM_PERMIT.description: Other users can't use your bot in PM (type yes to activate or no to deactivate ; don't write in capital letter)

BOT_NAME.description: put a name for your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: add one or many links for your bot menu  ; eg : url1,url2,url3.....

PUBLIC_MODE.description: type yes to put your bot on public mode or no to put it on private mode

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Type yes if you want the bot to reply to statuses

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: type yes to put your bot on public mode or no to put it on private mode

SESSION_ID.description: put your session ID, the code you receive after scanning QR code

NUMERO_OWNER.description: Your number, don't put '+' and put your area code (example of Togo '228')

WARN_COUNT.description: this is the limit of warnings for warning commands

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: if you don't want starting-bot-message put no else put yes

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: 1 to indicate that you are online even if you are not. 2 to indicate that you are currently typing a message. 3 to indicate that you are currently recording an audio. Or leave the field blank to indicate your real state.

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: if you want to enable anti-delete message put yes else put no

ANTICALL.description: Automatically decline incoming calls. Type 'on' to activate or 'off' to deactivate.

AUTO_REACTION.description: Put yes if you want the bot to react to messages in private
